promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi young simple swan psychic-type wearing a ancient crown. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or psychic. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crypticraven, a chibi young simple swan psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: heart-stamp, instruct. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word swan or psychic or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, swan-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: Crypticraven is a mysterious dweller of crypts. It uses its mysterious powers to play tricks on others while stamping its mark of love.
